<h1 align='center' style='border-bottom: none;'>Sturnus</h1>
<h3 align='center'>Starling Cloud</h3>
</header>

<br/>

---

A Python library for demonstration and publishing to PyPI.

---

## Installation

```bash
pip install sturnus
```

---

## Usage

```python
from sturnus import hello

print(hello("Starling"))
```
